text: Marco Rodriguez may refer to: * Marco Rodríguez (actor) (born 1953), Hispanic- American actor * Marco Antonio Rodríguez (born 1973), Mexican football referee * Marco Antonio Rodríguez (racewalker) (born 1994), Bolivian racewalker * Marco Rodriguez, known as Khushnood Butt outside Japan, a video game character from Garou: Mark of the Wolves * Marco Rodríguez (footballer), El Salvadorian football player for A.D. Chalatenango
title: Marco Rodríguez
